body.name: AOC 22B3HM 22" Class Full HD 75Hz Monitor, Adaptive-Sync, HDR Mode, for Home and Office, HDMI, VGA, LowBlue, VESA
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 22 mins
features: 21.5-inch AOC computer monitor with an ultra-slim profile and minimal bezels, perfect for everyday computing, home and office use, and gaming
EXPAND YOUR VIEW: Its minimalistic, 3-sided frameless design allows for maximum visibility and seamless multi-monitor setups to enhance your workflow and boost productivity
CRISP VISUALS: With Full HD 1920x1080 resolution, your favorite movies and games appear more realistic and dramatic and all the small details and text on photo and work applications are clear
SEE IT FROM ANY ANGLE: IPS panel ensures an excellent viewing experience with vivid and accurate colors from virtually any point of view
GAME READY: Fast 75Hz refresh rate delivers a smooth, fluid picture, so you can enjoy movies, games, and other entertainment without the effects of lag or ghosting
RICH COLORS FOR WORK & PLAY: Over 16.7 million colors and 101.7% sRGB color gamut coverage brings characters and scenes to life with brilliant, true-to-life colors
DESIGNED FOR YOUR WELLBEING: AOC LowBlue Light protects your eyes from harmful blue lights while maintaining color composition
FOCUSED COMFORT: AOC Flicker-Free technology minimizes eye fatigue for a more comfortable viewing experience during long work hours
VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY: HDMI 1.4 x1 and VGA x1, and 3.5mm audio-out x1 for maximum convenience (HDMI cable included)
MAKE IT YOUR OWN: VESA compatible 100x100 wall mount and monitor arm mount support for flexible mounting options and tilt adjustments for viewing comfort optimized for your needs
body.description: The AOC 22B3HM is a 21.5-inch monitor with vivid imagery and all the essentials you need for home, office, and gaming. It features a slim profile and a 3-sided borderless panel for a modern, sleek design and seamless multi-monitor setup. Thanks to the VA 178/178 degree extra wide viewing angle, you can witness Full HD resolution and consistent colors from a wide range of viewing angles, with up to 101% sRGB color gamut area coverage. Whether you’re working on documents, playing games, or watching movies, you’ll enjoy all your content in superbly detailed full quality and brilliant colors. The 75Hz refresh rate delivers smooth, fluid scenes. Adaptive-Sync ensures ultra-smooth, tear-free team fights for flawless skill shots and stutter-free frame transitions. Whether you're catching up on your favorite TV series, watching videos, or playing a game, you can enjoy all of your entertainment without lag or ghosting effects. The included stand is tilt adjustable to provide each user with an optimal viewing angle for comfort during extended gaming and computing sessions. The monitor is also VESA compatible, allowing you to quickly change to another type of mounting solution. All AOC monitors guaranteed are covered by a three-year warranty, starting from the original date of purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean, simple, thin, frameless, and works with everything... Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I have a home office setup with an ACER ultra-wide second monitor on a floating arm. It's a nice monitor, but for some reason it's a buggar to get my work laptop (a Dell CAD workstation) to find the correct resolution with. I had to fiddle with the settings (as it's a 75Hz monitor) and finally my system recognized the correct settings... and even with that, sometimes my system sees the monitor as just a 1920x1080 generic PnP monitor or sporadically flashes in and out (as if it's struggling to find the correct settings/source (as it's autosensing). Ugh. It drives me nuts. With that, I also use it has an extended monitor for my home setup (where my wife and I share the monitor, swapping between a couple older MS Surface products (SurfacePro5 and SurfaceBook2)); when those are hooked up to the ACER ultra-widescreen monitor, it's the worst looking stretched-out blurry 1920x1080 interpretation, and by no means 75Hz). It was nasty.Now bring in this AOC 27" monitor. It's a big monitor, but it has basic settings: 1920x1080 at ~60Hz. It's much thinner than the bulkier ACER, and this AOC monitor is nicely 'frameless'. It fits on the computer arm in our little home office so much better/more-flush. Also, it is instantly recognized by all our computers and Windows effortlessly matches up the correct settings. It's a clean, bright, and crisp image monitor. It's SOOO much nicer with our older laptops than that ACER ultra-wide.I had such high hopes for that ACER ultra-wide... but this taller rectangular 27' AOC unit is actually much nicer to work with. The AOC viewing real estate is 13.5"x24"... where the ACER ultra-wide is 11.5"x27". The taller/narrower AOC screen is just nicer when reading webpages, building a presentation slide, or doing CAD. That's probably just a preference (based on my usage), but it's noticeable. I imagine the ultra-wide is perhaps better for gaming, but it didn't really work well for other uses.Oh, and for under $100, this AOC 27" unit is a smokin' deal! Great size, quality, and performance for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome monitor if you are on a budget!
reviews.reviewText: I am not able to afford a more expensive monitor, but I need to say this one is perfect! It is very easy to set up, extremely light, the box is really compact, it is also extremely light and when assembled the screen can be moved vertically about 20°. This is my first IPS screen and I am very satisfied, it is also the smallest one I ever had, but needless to say 24” is not bad, and other than it’s technical use, the monitor is very aesthetically pleasing. I use it as my main screen (and only one.) But I believe professionals or gamers would find it more useful as a secondary one. Overall, it is a great for people on a budget, or people who don’t need a better one. Extremely satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for the price!
reviews.reviewText: So happy I bought this monitor! It is a great monitor to have at home for my work for home days. Thankfully the HDMI cable works with my work computer and my personal computer. Overall, very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor has a fairly decent resolution and color quality!! It didn't my 5 stars only because the stand is not adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Budget Monitor
reviews.reviewText: What's there to say, really? It's a monitor. There's nothing fancy about it. No super awesome killer specs. It's a good size monitor, at a decent price & works perfectly fine. Using as 2nd display to have Discord & Spotify visible while gaming. 10/10 I'll buy another if I decide to setup a triple monitor system. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewText: Easy set up, sturdy. The instructions say to anchor it to the wall, but I feel its unnecessary. Clear picture. Great for my real estate office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son as his second monitor. Great value for a 24 inch display. Good image good resolution refresh is good. Very pleased with this purchase. Great monitor for the price
Definitivamente calidad-precio, buen monitor, lo uso para un computadora que desarrolla contenidos y diseño grafico. El espectro Rgb es adecuado.

The monitor arrived within half a day which was great as I have been struggling with laptop small screen. It is perfect as my primary screen and now life is much easier with 2. I simply plugged it in and I have not looked back. I rated this 5 due to value for money, ease of install and delivery.
Se siente de buena calidad y buen tamaño, el ips le da un plus

its perfect for my casual gaming, watching movies and doing homeworks and work! the quality is incredible and i love the fact that it’s slightly bent, it makes it easier to look around (since its so big). i would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Price.. Great Shipping... Amazing Value
reviews.reviewText: I needed a monitor for a few months while is Australia that would work with my Surface Pro this seemed good value and setup took all of 2 minutesComes with a HDMI Cable which is a winEasy took 10 seconds to connect base ..The best bit is I did not have to read instructions so I kept my man card... AOC 24 for the WIN
